Reviews.Title: Perfect Pink for a Princesses Room
Reviews.Author: Shopping Momma
Reviews.Content: Great color, great picture, good size for a little girls room. MY only "heads up" is that it's not completely flat. So, be careful onm what mount you get. The bottom is wider than the top.

Reviews.Title: Pink TV is sweet
Reviews.Author: Brittany Shiplett
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv for a bedroom. It sits nicely in the small space I have and has a good picture.

Reviews.Title: Great for Girl's Room
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to match my daughter's pink and white room.  Instead of a standard black TV, I decided a pink TV would look cute.  We've had no problems with it.  I believe you have an option to mount it onto the wall, but we have it sitting on a dresser.  The bottom part of the TV is much wider than the top portion.We have a military FPO address.  Unfortunately, the vendor would not ship it to us.  Instead, we had to pay a middle-man to make it happen.  Not sure why they won't expand their shipping locations.  The FPO address is just as shipping to California.  Paying extra for all the shipping was the only down-fall.  Overall, satisfied with the TV.

ProductInfo.Features:
22-inch designer LCD TV
Dynamic contrast ratio 30,000:1
1 HDMI, PC input, 1 component input
USB input for video, audio and digital pictures; Pause live TV with USB TimeShift
SRS TruSurround XT Sound; Sound leveler with distortion control; 2x3W output
22" Lcd Color Display
3D Digital Comb Filter
720P Resolution
Integrated Atsc/Ntsc/Qam Tuners
ProductInfo.Name: Haier HL22FP2 Pink 22-Inch Designer F Series LCD HDTV
